title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5605.3 - Submission of accounting records and reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5605.3 - Submission of accounting records and reports

State Regulations
(a) Maintenance of records. Registrants shall maintain accurate and complete accounting records that
correctly record and explain the transactions and financial position for the
registrant's interactive fantasy sports operations. Such records shall be
maintained in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles. All
such records shall be made available to the commission upon request. (b) Submission of reports and
statements. Pursuant to Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
section 1409(2), each registrant shall submit, in a form and manner approved by
the commission, a monthly report and reconciliation statement to the commission
on or before the 10th business day of each month with respect to gross revenues
and deposits received and made during the preceding month. Notes

New

York State Register October 18, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 42, eff. 10/18/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
